website_summaries.verdict: Don't discount this windshield cover because of the minor quirks, as it still offers reliable protection from both snow and sun.
pros: Features side flaps that secure inside vehicle doors and make it easy to put on/take off
Dense material provides excellent protection from UV rays
cons: Only comes in one size, and that size doesn't provide an accurate fit for some vehicles

customer_reviews.title: If You Live In the Snow Country You Best Buy One
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I thought these things were ridiculous and a total waste of money. I bought one for my wife's car this winter, on a lightening deal, so I wasn't too concerned about the waste. This thing was the best buy of the year. Its kind of a booger to put on when the winds are howling, but it saves so much time in the long run. I would highly recommend this to any of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: bigfootTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: I will keep it because it is better than no cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover does not fit the front window of a 2008 Ford Taurus, there is a gap on the passenger side of 2" at the top "above the ear/flap " and 3 " at the bottom "below the ear/flap". I will keep it because it is better than no cover. I measured the window before ordering the cover, either I measured wrong or the cover is undersized.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Pros Keeps car cooler in summer Easy to fold up Cons Outside installation Can be easily ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros Keeps car cooler in summer Easy to fold up Cons Outside installation Can be easily taken out of car doors (no damage to cover) and stolen
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Howey

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for the sun, but sadly they never last long
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 10th cover I bought of this style (not this seller), and they never last long under the California's sun. They are nice and shinny when new out of the box, and even some comes with a nice storage bag like this one. Unfortunately, after a few month (or sometimes weeks) of every day use, those just start to get brittle and fall apart. I still want to get them because there are not much outdoor car cover on the market. But I just don't think that those should be priced above $10 though.
customer_reviews.author: Orcatrainer

customer_reviews.title: I love this. It fit my 2017 Subaru Forester perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It fit my 2017 Subaru Forester perfectly. I use it for sun/shade because I take my dogs with me everywhere and covering the windshield from the exterior is the best cooling for them. I added a couple of magnets on the top (not necessary, but hold it snug in a breeze) and some elastic on the sides so i can fasten it inside (anti-theft - also not needed for function at the doors pin it in place). I'm so impressed with how this works I made one for the back window. I live in a very hot and dry area so can recommend for sun (don't know about snow).
customer_reviews.author: Live Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Product was much thinner than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for its sunscreen characteristics. But I was disappointed in its thin composition, although it advertises multiple layers for thermo-insulation effect. They seem "cheaply" make, and does not have thermo-dampening quality I expected. There is little, if any, improvement over the slightly cheaper and thinner version that goes on the inside of the windshield. I'll likely offer an update to this review after field testing in extreme sunshine on hot days over several days.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Package Display
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these as Christmas gifts for my family. 2 were sent to them directly, 1 to me. I was excited for b them to open to until I received the shipment. there was no directions no description nothing just the item itself in a cheap looking display. That was really disappointing! A real Xmas damper... And that's y i give 2 Stars for looking cheap - no one can be excited for getting this. & It can be easily stolen/taken off the car. Hopefully it works better than it looks... If I learn it perform as said I will update n give more Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Y.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons 2012 Honda CRZ and it fits perfectly. At school his car sits out all day and it's a real pain to come out to ice or snow on the windshield. This is exactly what he needs. It's a really nice cover. It's well made and looks like it'll last. This is super easy to put on and take off of the car. It comes in a nice carrying bag, which is great for storage when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Kari & Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a cooler car and dash protection.
customer_reviews.text: This item stays in place very well even on windy days since the doors close in the flaps and the wipers hold the lower edge. It shields against heat very well and fits my Nissan Versa Note perfectly. My only concern is that it soaks up rain, but it does dry quickly when hung.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie B

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Windshield Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover for the windshield is outstanding, very lite weight, very strong & very well made, very easy to install. Just open the passager door, put the one flap inside & close the door, then extend the cover over the windshield open the driver door, insert the flap & close the door, you're all done & ready for it to snow or that frozen rain, it will be nice not to have to scrap that frozen snow or ice. This is a great product & worth every penny & it is made of a very high quality material, "very strong" so it will last for many winters.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie R.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Rain and melting snow cause this to hold moisture not only against your car but the flaps that go inside your 🚗 also get soaked and hold moisture in your vehicle. This is of course very bad for your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: D S L

customer_reviews.title: Keep snow off, but does not hold warmth inside
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the winter when I go to the mountain to snowboard with my dogs in the car. It worked well to keep the snow off of my front windshield, yes. I was also hoping for some insulation warmth, which it fallS short on. I bought two so I could try to use one on my back windshield as well, I have a jeep grand Cherokee. It’s harder to get to stay on the window, but it did the trick mostly
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Works for a year, then disintegrates
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these about a year ago, one for my Maserati and one for my Jaguar, both of which are parked in the sun on my driveway. It's typically 94 degrees here in Sarasota year round, and always sunny. About a month ago, both shades started to disintegrate. The silver outer surface started flecking off. Putting them in the car left "glitter" all over. Now most of the silver has come off both of them. Also, for cars with frameless windows (e.g., Maserati Ghibli), the thickness of the shade can misalign the side windows. My passenger window now binds occasionally on the car's B-pillar trim.
customer_reviews.author: Classic in VA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome windshield cover
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing during the winter. I just pulled it off the windshield like a blanket and it didn't stick at all. All the snow slid right off so no scraping of ice or anything. Definitely worth the purchase. Has a little bag to fold up into also which is great for your vehicle so it's some what organized.
customer_reviews.author: A. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Protects my car's glass and interior
customer_reviews.text: We keep this over the windshield of my car to protect the windshield from snow, debris and the sun as well as to keep the interior cool so it sin't damaged by summer heat. It's easy to put on and is easily secured by the wipers and doors. It's lightweight and folds up into it's storage bag without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Works we and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Eaay to use and works well. I have to keep my car outside sometimes and when I go to work early in the morning during these winter monthes, sometimes there is frost on my windshield. This cover really helps save me time in the mornings so I'm not sitting in the driveway waiting for the windshield to defrost. Great value and quality product.
customer_reviews.author: S.Kim

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Midwest
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic addition to winterize your vehicle. Living in Minnesota and parking outdoors, the snow cover has eliminated the time needed to chisel away ice and snow. Simply shack it off and toss it in backseat or trunk. It’s lightweight, and seems durable so far. Planning to use this for the summer as well to keep the interior cool.
customer_reviews.author: IMIAN

customer_reviews.title: Great in all weather
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for me. I am use to a garage and for a few months did not have one. I placed this on the windshield and it worked in all weather. Even when the snow or ice turned to rain (or vice versa) I had no trouble with the leaking inside my car that others spoke about. Glad I have not had this issue. Of course I don't place it on the windshield if all it's going to do is rain. Makes no sense to me.
customer_reviews.author: dubbled21

customer_reviews.title: Cool windshield snow cover
customer_reviews.text: I got it just before snow season as taking off snow from the windshield in icy cold weather is extremely hard and this product seem to work well. I tried installing in my car and it is easy to do. I hope I will remember and go put it on before snow. Can work as a sun cover too but that’s not that practical as this needs to go outside.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a good idea, but lets water leak in through door seals.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these: two to give as gifts and one for myself. I used mine for the first time a few days ago when the local forecast called for a night of freezing rain. The storm turned out to be a bust -- mostly rain with only slight icing around these hear parts. The windshield cover also turned out to be a bust. Those wings that you shut in the doors to keep the cover lying flat... well, they let in so much rain that I ended up with almost two inches of water in the front foot wells of my car. Never again! And I am really embarrassed that I gave these as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: SongFrog

customer_reviews.title: ... order for your car) that may work a little better but this one does the job for a realistic ...
customer_reviews.text: There probably are more expensive ones (ones made to order for your car) that may work a little better but this one does the job for a realistic price. Mine does leak a tiny bit where the flaps go in the doors but when I use it I can tolerate this. Sure helps during a freezing rain spell, easy to pull off and your windshield is clear. Plus, it keeps your wipers from freezing down.
customer_reviews.author: Pat W

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver in Maine during the winter
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my boyfriend and myself last year and they were honestly the best thing for winter time in Maine. Everyone hates cleaning off your car in the morning after it has snowed, but this is really easy to put on the night before and when you leave for work you just have to open your doors and remove the cover...NO MORE SNOW, NO MORE SCRAPPING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Butler

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality windshield cover! I was pleasantly surprised. Both by the thickness of the cover (which is not cheap at all) and by its ease of folding. Indeed, I wanted a blanket to save time in the morning to no longer scratch my windshield. And I didn't want to waste any folding ... just shake the blanket for 2 seconds and quickly fold it. From the top of my 1m65, I get there without worries.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Hahaha
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my car (it doesn't cover the entire window) and everyone at work was scrapping heavy ice off their cars. I pulled this off and was able to just drive away. (Don't worry I wasn't that much of a jerk. I stayed and helped them scrap their cars)
customer_reviews.author: Hamster

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a hassle
customer_reviews.text: This is a pain to try to put on if it’s windy. Make sure to tuck it under your windshield wipers too. Sometimes I think it’s more trouble than it’s worth. There is one that my friend has that she got from QVC. It’s better and I recommend that.
customer_reviews.author: Licia

customer_reviews.title: A very pleasant way to protect your windshield.
customer_reviews.text: This protective cover is a wonderful product! I rely on it so much here at my housing complex in Florida. We do not have garages, just parking spaces. The sun beats down on my car, but with the silver cover stretched over the windshield, the glass is protected very well. And it is so easy to put on: just open the side door and insert the flap, pull the pleasant cottony material over the windshield, and put the other flap into the opening In the driver's side door. That secures the cover, and even in storms, the cover does not budge.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vandepaer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work with.
customer_reviews.text: It was much thicker that I thought it would be. Even with the windy, rainy conditions it installed without much problem, once I got the first "tail" closed in the door. It was a little bit smaller than my windshield, but I only had to scrape about 2/3 inches of ice and snow.
customer_reviews.author: RiverMiester

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what's advertised
customer_reviews.text: Keeps ice off my windshield and when it snows I can just pull it all off at once. Doesn't take long to put on since you just use your doors and windshield wipers to keep it in place. It is hard to put on if it's windy though. I also wish it was more waterproof since melted snow and ice will freeze onto it. Other than that really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this razor!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second razor like this we have bought through the years. It's easy to get the cleaning cartridges and new heads for them and they last a LONG time!
customer_reviews.author: Robin L.

customer_reviews.title: is ok
customer_reviews.text: it is good to have it in case of possible hail storm, better that not having any protection for your windshield but it seems a little too thin, so I am not sure if it would be enough to protect windshield from hail.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be thicker
customer_reviews.text: It does what ot is ment to do for sure. The issue I have is that it is brittle and I ripped a corner on the third use. I still use it and it is nice not having frost all over the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the snow and frost off the windshield. In the summer I have used it to block the sun. Does a good job for all seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Tycen L.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this product so bad and this is what it look like that for the first night of having it put on my car. Completely flip down and defeated the purpose
customer_reviews.author: amy l.

customer_reviews.title: Value of money
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes with a bag for easy storage, and it was nicely folded. The cover is pretty wide and it fits my windshield perfectly, haven't really put it in use but getting ready for snowy weather!
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Very Good BUT
customer_reviews.text: The sunshade does a great job of blocking and reflecting sunshine. It is lightweight and easily installed unless there is a brisk wind. Liked enough to purchase for daughter and son-in-law's vehicles. HOWEVER, mine is less than a year old and as a result of folding and refolding, the reflective material is shedding and now all over the inside of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Psyops

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he grins and floats when he see other people having to shave off ice and shovel off snow but then hates it when he forgets or think there none coming and it didn’t get put on in time lol he really likes it though
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: My husband thinks this windshield cover works great
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I don't have any details, I just bought this for my husband and he likes it a lot. And that's saying something because he's hard to please. LOL
customer_reviews.author: W.D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The snow gets enough friction from the fabric that it doesn't slide out from under the snow and leave it behind on the windshield. I just shake it a bit and fold it up. It fits under the seat when folded. Invaluable in Montana! (I drive a 2017 Nissan Rogue and it fits just fine.)
customer_reviews.author: crackerjackheart

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Fits as stated
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits as stated. Very easy to use. Makes it easy to remove snow and keeps window free of frost and ice. Works great to keep the sun from heating up the car and keeping the sap off of the window in the summer. Would recommend product to help make life a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: No more ice
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for keeping from scraping ice. It comes in a nice package for easy storage in your trunk. The only down side is that it does collect water when it rains so you need to let it dry out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buford

customer_reviews.title: Works for my CR-V.
customer_reviews.text: This windshield cover is so useful during snow I like the way they designed it. Great value for money. This work son my cr-v and it’s exact fit. No work on cleaning snow every morning.😀
customer_reviews.author: Sbabburi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This works awesome for preventing my windshield from freezing. I am now able to get in my car and go in the mornings without having to wait 10 minutes or longer for the windshield to defrost.
customer_reviews.author: ljis4me

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This definitely helps on snowy days, but the issue I’ve found is when it’s really windy, the top third of the cover tries to fold over. Its really easy to install daily and fits on my Buick LaCrosse windshield with ease. The product isn’t terrible, but it’s also not great.
customer_reviews.author: Rene T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep back and front windows free of dust.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these -- one for front windshield and other for back window. Light weight, easy to remove/put on and perfect for So. Calif. to keep car windows clear of dust. Some folks might use it for something called "snow." Not sure exactly what "snow" is. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mom Almighty

customer_reviews.title: First frost and I was in love. First snow and I was a convert
customer_reviews.text: First frost and I was in love. First snow and I was a convert. Easy to put on, no magnets to scratch your paint, and just whip it off and have a clear windshield. Scraping ice off of my car is one of my least favorite activities, so this is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Weeping Aingeal

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Product is not waterproof and moisture seeps into your car. My floor boards were soaken wet from using this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No scraping or numb fingers 😂
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver after working a 10hr shift no sitting and waiting to defrost just heat and go. Great on heavy frost mornings also
customer_reviews.author: Delilah Deloach

customer_reviews.title: Protects windshield from outside elements year round, flips over for season change.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps cold and hot weather elements off your car outside (you flip it over for season change) and protects interior from sun.
customer_reviews.author: Bash

customer_reviews.title: Always be perpaired for the snow. It’s great for rain.
customer_reviews.text: This the best product that I got from amazon and it great when the snow comes this winter. It’s great when it rains too.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: No more icy windshields!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect on keeping your windshield free from ice, snow and condensation! It is also very easy to use. It is perfect for the winter season!
customer_reviews.author: Socal_A

customer_reviews.title: Useability
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonderfully except,... only after a year or so from folding the silver starts peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Measure your windshield to ensure proper fit.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and seems to be made well. Most SUVs does not include a good fit for Infinity QX80 or Ford Explorer. It will work for these SUVs, but it will not cover the entire windshield. It took less than a minute to install.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and use. I had to buy this because our parking lot is full of trees that carry nuts and it cracked my window. This has helped protect the window after it was changed.
customer_reviews.author: yanilda

customer_reviews.title: but glad they kept their word
customer_reviews.text: The surface materials survived the snow & rains as it's suppose to, and it's in 1 piece w/o damage. I was nervous, but glad they kept their word.
customer_reviews.author: Boomster

customer_reviews.title: Great window cover
customer_reviews.text: Great and does what is advertised. I only wish I would’ve gotten one that covers the side windows too!
customer_reviews.author: Scott C Chrisman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. It makes snowy mornings , Frosty mornings easy to deal with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cover several times (stupid ice and snow). My windshield has always remained clear of ice and snow. Easy to put in and off!
customer_reviews.author: Wickedwitch

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, does the job. Keeps ice and snow off the windshield and you can clean it with one swoop. Also keep the car cool in the summer the sun
customer_reviews.author: Kimbra

customer_reviews.title: room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Does the job as long as there is no wind, when windy it just pulls out because there is nothing to stop it from just pulling out of the door frane
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Easy On, Easy Off
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to put on and take off. Folds easily, and comes with its own storage pouch. Be sure to put it on before the bad weather hits
customer_reviews.author: M. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. Works great with the winter weather
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Great - easy to put on, easy to put off. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: BA Goodsell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So convenient, worked for my car. I no longer have to wait to defrost my windshield in the cold winter months. Would not go on without it.
customer_reviews.author: V G Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Windshield cover
customer_reviews.text: It worked to keep the ice and snow off windshield
customer_reviews.author: Tigger_48

customer_reviews.title: Completely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It's easy on, easy off and it protects my windshield from frost. I'm completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: fRANK b

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Hyundai Genesis, too small, poor match for car.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit Hyundai Genesis. Not big enough. Rear wind shield lower portion will fold up if wind comes fro rear of car. Will follow up after blizzard tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Fishdetector

customer_reviews.title: Good price and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Subaru just right. Easy to use, easy to take off. Clean windshield...no ice or snow when I get up in the morning. No stressful scraping!
customer_reviews.author: yankee

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I would have given more stars for installation, but it is not easy to secure the cover if it is windy outdoors. And during Michigan winters, it is typically windy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting one with magnets. My mistake. I works ok tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My days of scraping ice are over!
customer_reviews.text: This item works well in the winter. I don't have to scrape my windshield from ice at 4 in the morning. It will fit a sedan and 95% of a SUV windshield. Highly recommend it! I bought more as gifts for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: This windshield cover was perfect! I never had anything to clean off when I used it, just shook off any snow and ice. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TJanicek

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my mom who is always running late and often forgets to defrost her windshield in the morning before leaving for work. She absolutely loves it; it is easy to use and prevents frost and snow from sticking to the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: No snow yet! But works good so far
customer_reviews.text: Finally tried this the other day. Haven’t had snow but a thin layer of ice. It kept the windshield clear for the most part and stayed secure. Will update when we get snow 👍
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome solution to a really cold morning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husbands truck and it fits his windshield perfectly! I’m also excited that it has several layers so it will be perfect for the really cold nights and mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Jones

customer_reviews.title: ... product yet due to weather but the quality is great I like it a lot sure it will be ...
customer_reviews.text: have not used this product yet due to weather but the quality is great I like it a lot sure it will be wonderful and work well for the summer hot months..
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: It also keeps dirt and grime and bird debris off.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received on time but you get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.author: dlv1156

customer_reviews.title: Valuable product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This product has been an absolute life saver!! The blower motor on my car broke so the defroster isn’t working. I put it on each night throughout the winter and in the morning the windshield is completely clear! Stays secure to the car all night. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Pasquale

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I purchased two and I’m happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: No more scraping windshield!
customer_reviews.text: It is snowing outside, and accumulations are expected. Love not having to scrape my window or use a de-icer. Quality product that meets expectations.
customer_reviews.author: TennisVol

customer_reviews.title: I used it this winter and it does a good job so you dont have to clean off your ...
customer_reviews.text: This ice shield works alright. I used it this winter and it does a good job so you dont have to clean off your windshield in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Best product to bring with you to tahoe
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to Tahoe. Saved us tons of time in the morning. It works! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Check before buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like to have it, but it was too small for my car and I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Pyae Phyoe Lin

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to set up. It was purchased for my gf, she loves it..
customer_reviews.author: William B. Dulmage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things I was skeptical about when I ordered it, but boy, am I glad I did! It has saved me all kinds of time over the winter not having to scrape snow and ice off my windshield. This really works!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G

customer_reviews.title: Windshield cover
customer_reviews.text: It’s so much better then the shades. Just close the doors on the tabs and put wipers on top to help hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Detlaff

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Just make sure it’s under the wipers or it will blow away
customer_reviews.author: FELICIA S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine to keep ice/snow off windshield
customer_reviews.text: It leaves a residue on the windshield. It’s fine to keep ice/snow off windshield. Residue comes off easily enough, just annoying
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a Gift/Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has been wanting this for a long time - very happy.
customer_reviews.author: LAL

customer_reviews.text: We have record snow fall and this is working perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Not for rain
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to snow but it rained. It was soaked when I took it off my car in the morning and I had to put it in the backseat soaking wet. Did not repel of the rain

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Keeps the windshield covered on cold nights
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Keeps the windshield covered on cold nights. I like the flaps that fold in the car doors. Although, my windshield is about three-inches taller than the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Russo

product_meta.title: MATCC Car Windshield Snow Cover 4Layers Frost Guard Winter Snow Ice Cover Snow Cover Protector Winter Snow Removal Car Cover Waterproof for Most Cars All Weather Blocks UV Rays Dust Particle
feature_bullets: ★ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY:Selection of high-level PVC fabric.High Density Material, Waterproof, Dust-proof, Sun-proof, Frost-proof and Fire Retardant. Keep the windshield Clean & Clear, help blocking the car wiper area from filling with leaves and pine needles.

★HOT SUMMER: Extra Thick Dual Layer design, Protects your vehicle from UV damage, blocking out nearly 99 % of UV rays, help to turn down the heat in your interior. So that your interior will not Overheat, even if parking in the open-air parking lot for a long time in summer.

★SNOWY WINTER: Keeping Snow/Ice Off During The Winter, Snow Will Not Leak Through the Cover. It resists water absorption to make sure all snow and frost on the outer surface can be removed with ease. No More Scraping, No More Frozen Wipers, No More Wasting Time Waiting for Defrosting! This premium windshield cover to make life easier for all vehicle owners saving time and money!

★EASY INSTALLATION: Easy and Convenient to Use, No Tools Required for Installation. Secure with Side Flaps Design, Prevent from Falling Off. And when you come back? Simply pull off the cover and all the snow, frost, ice or leaves.
★ANY VEHICLE:All-seasons Windshield Cover fits most Cars and SUV. 57.87 Inch(width) X 40.16 Inch(height).
